1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-fanbox-widget
1.0.description:
Facebook Fanbox Widget is a simple plugin which display the Facebook Fan box on your wordpress website. Its a simple plugin which does one thing and does it well.

No need to create Facebook app and mesing with API Keys. Simply place the widget on your website and you are good to go.

Displaying the Facebook Fanpage on your website allows the visitors to like your page without leaving your site.

Read the documentation here

For any support related queries pls use the Wordpress Forums.

Features

  • Customizable Widget Title
  • No need to mess up with HTML
  • Mutilingual (Translation Ready)
